Actions.Name: Blackheart
Actions.Effect: Deals 2 damage to all foes adjacent to the archon or their target. Gains +1 boon and true strike if character is stunned, dazed, or winded.

Actions.Name: Iron Fist
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save or become dazed, if they are already dazed, they are also winded.

Actions.Name: Great Bash
Actions.Description: Dash 2 spaces, then an adjacent foe is shoved 1 space.

Actions.Name: Great Shieldwall
Actions.Description: While in this stance, becomes immobile, but self and adjacent allies gain resistance. Ends at the start of the Archon's next turn.
